description: Acne is a common skin condition that occurs when hair follicles become clogged with oil and dead skin cells. The clogged pores can lead to the formation of pimples, blackheads, and whiteheads. Acne can occur anywhere on the body, but it most commonly affects the face, neck, chest, and back.
symptoms: Blackheads Whiteheads Papules (small red bumps) Pustules (pimples filled with pus) Cysts (large, painful, pus-filled lumps)  Nodules (hard, painful lumps beneath the skin)
remedies: Cleanse your face twice a day with a gentle cleanser to remove excess oil, dirt, and bacteria from the skin.
